SELECT DISTINCT c.product_id, COALESCE(p.name, pc.product_name, c.product_id) AS product_name, c.quantity, (COALESCE(p.price, 0) * c.quantity) AS price FROM cart_items c LEFT JOIN products p ON ( CAST(p.product_id AS VARCHAR) = c.product_id OR p.product_code = c.product_id ) LEFT JOIN product_code pc ON pc.product_code = c.product_id WHERE c.user_id = CAST(#{userId} AS BIGINT) AND c.is_active = 1

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(item_price), 0) AS total_amount FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (c.cart_item_id) c.cart_item_id, (COALESCE(p.price, 0) * c.quantity) AS item_price FROM cart_items c LEFT JOIN products p ON ( CAST(p.product_id AS VARCHAR) = c.product_id OR p.product_code = c.product_id ) WHERE c.user_id = CAST(#{userId} AS BIGINT) AND c.is_active = 1 ORDER BY c.cart_item_id, p.price DESC NULLS LAST ) t
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) FROM cart_items WHERE user_id = CAST(#{userId} AS BIGINT) AND is_active = 1
